column2: CRH Medical Corp. engages in the provision of gastroenterologists with services and products for the treatment of gastrointestinal diseases. The company is headquartered in Vancouver, British Columbia and currently employs 87 full-time employees. The firm focused on providing physicians with services and products for the treatment of gastrointestinal diseases. The firm also provides anesthesiology services to gastroenterologists in the United States through its subsidiaries. The firm specializes in the treatment of hemorrhoids utilizing its treatment protocol and technology. The firm's product distribution strategy focuses on physician education, patient outcomes, and patient awareness. The firm's CRH O'Regan System, platform that provides gastrointestinal is a single use, disposable, hemorrhoid banding technology for treating hemorrhoid grades I-IV. The firm distributes the CRH O'Regan System, treatment protocols, operational and marketing expertise as a package to physicians. The firm's subsidiary, Gastroenterology Anesthesia Associates, LLC, provides anesthesiology services for gastroenterology procedures.
